videos.description: Stephen F. Austin's Roti Ware sprints down the court after grabbing the loose ball and sends in a mammoth and-1 dunk.
videos.headline: Stephen F. Austin's Ware flattens defender on monster and-1 jam

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Stephen F. Austin’s Ware flattens defender on monster and-1 jam) 2019/12/02 ESHEET
